RelatedSentence: QUEZON CITY -- A total of 1,916 have so far signed the online signature campaign calling on President Benigno Aquino III and the legislators to pass the Freedom of Information ( FOI ) Bill .

A1: the online signature campaign calling on President Benigno Aquino III and the legislators to pass the Freedom of Information -LRB- FOI -RRB- Bill
RelatedSentence: The campaign was launched by press freedom advocates on May 14 .
Network and affiliated groups encouraged the Filipinos to sign the campaign , which will be submitted to Aquino a week before his fifth State of the Nation Address ( Sona ) slated in July this year .

A1: Senate Bill 1733 , also known as People 's FOI Act
RelatedSentence: Senator Grace Poe sponsored the Senate bill .

Under the measure , Filipino citizens will have the right to request and be granted access to records or information that is under the control of government unless the information requested would jeopardize national security , foreign relations , law enforcement operations , trade and economic secrets , individual right 's to privacy , privileged information as considered in judicial proceedings or information made in executive sessions of Congress and those that are covered by presidential privilege .
